title: B.S. Report - The Grantland Basketball Hour (Ep. 1)
description: 'The Grantland Basketball Hour' originally aired October 23rd, with guest appearances from Jeff Van Gundy, Grantland writer Zach Lowe, Doc Rivers, and Michelle Beadle.
